about_the_game:
Welcome to Paradox Guardians! An adult open-world RPG where you, a Paradox Academy student, and your navigator, Anna, are transported to Earth to face the ultimate test: conquer the planet and stop the Jurri, a seductive alien race manipulating reality. Explore a world of danger, illusions, and intimate encounters as you uncover the secrets of the Jurri and master your warp powers.

You ended up on a strange and unknown planet, Earth, stripped of your advanced tools and resources. A mysterious alien race, the Jurri, manipulate reality to control the planet.

You must uncover the truth behind the Jurri’s influence, conquer their seductive powers, and decide the fate of Earth.

Earth is a beautiful world, but don’t let its illusions deceive you—this is a dangerous and deadly place. The Jurri have twisted reality, creating beautiful yet treacherous landscapes. Be ready to fight, survive, and resist their seductive allure.

Let your sexual dreams and desires run wild and without restrictions! With over high quality sex animations, experience the lust and all temptation of your partners that you will encounter during your journey, whether your companion Anna or the Jurri!

Do you have what it takes to satisfy their thirstiest needs?

  • Real time game-play

  • Real time high quality sex-scenes and animations made with Unity

  • Character Creation

  • Fully shape and customize your female companion in the way you desire

  • Explore diverse scenery

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains full body nudity, erotic dialogue, and consensual sex acts for the purpose of reproduction and pleasure.

All characters are 18+

name: Paradox Guardians Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X compatible
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Paradox Guardians is a real-time adult RPG where you play as an alien Time Traveler who arrives on Earth and must conquer the planet.
